title: There's a dead thing at the end of the hall.
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

You heard me.

It’s bent and pitiful and not as fresh as it used to be. 

I don’t go to that side of the house anymore. Come to think of it, I don’t think I ever did. The dead thing has always been there. That’s its domain, I’ve decided. The rest of the house is plenty for me.

But I still pass that hall every day. Most times I keep my eyes forward and pretend there’s nothing there. 

Some nights I stand at the end of the hall — my end — and stare for hours until my eyes adjust to the darkness. I can see the contours of its limbs and the glint of hate in his eyes. 

And then I go to bed. 

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: PeppersGhost
